type: Purchase, delivery and installation of category 1 and 2 office furniture
short_summary: Purchase office furniture (categories 1 and 2) for the British Columbia Region, expected contract completion date: April 30, 2024
description: "Amedment #3 is raised to updated the Request for bid and floor plan (January 8, 2024).",
full_summary:
### Title and Description

#### **Tender Title (English)** Purchase, Delivery and Installation of Category 1 and 2 Office Furniture for the British Columbia Region
#### **Tender Title (French)** Achat, Livraison et Installation de Mobilier de Bureau de Catégorie 1 et 2 pour la Région de la Colombie-Britannique

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) to purchase, deliver, and install office furniture of categories 1 and 2 for the British Columbia Region.

### Tender Details

#### **Reference Number** cb-729-4172231
#### **Amendment Number** 7
#### **Solicitation Number** 100024893
#### **Publication Date** 2023-12-19
#### **Tender Closing Date** 2024-01-18T14:00:00 ( expired )
#### **Expected Contract Start Date** 2024-02-01
#### **Expected Contract End Date** 2024-04-30
#### **Procurement Category** Goods and Services
#### **Notice Type** Request for Proposal
#### **Procurement Method** Competitive Selective Tendering
#### **Selection Criteria** Lowest Price

The procurement is subject to the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is set aside from international trade agreements.

### Requirement Description

Employment and Social Development Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at the Chahko Mika Mall in Nelson, British Columbia. The estimated delivery and installation dates are around April 30, 2024.

### Important Details

* Security requirements apply
* A security clearance will be required
* The procurement is subject to Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* A copy of the solicitation document and answer to inquiry document are attached to this notice.

To get access to more information such as solicitation documents, referring to the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27946/100024893-qa-qr_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27946/100024893-rfbamd3.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27946/100024893-rfbamd2.pdf

### Contact Information
